pathAssistantSteps.info:
You have now completed your Product Request 


Congratulations!
Defining a product request to ensure that you have clearly defined the Overall Product, and specified the team members that will be involved.
Designing a product is about ensuring that the appropriate Course record is created, to provide a structure for the product.
Releasing a product, is about making sure that the Product pages have been reviewed and all the design content has been reviewed to ensure that the wording is appropriate to market the product.
